title: Slave of the Si-Te-Cah
description: Delilah knew the giant skeleton her late father had discovered would be trouble, but she had no idea how much. When an anthropology professor and a good-looking Pinkerton detective show up at her homestead looking to investigate the discovery, Del finds herself embroiled in a search for the legendary Si-Te-Cah or Sasquatch -- a search that turns into a frightening nightmare when she is abducted and ravished by the very creatures they were seeking. Warning: Contains explicit depictions of monster sex, including forced consent acts with multiple non-human partners. Not intended for those under 18 years of age.
author: Alanna Cummings
